scripts.start:ioen-app: cross-env HC_PORT=$(port) concurrently "npm run playground" "npm run start:happ" "yarn --cwd ./ui ioen"
scripts.start:picogrid: cross-env PICO_PORT=$(port) concurrently "npm run start:picogridhapp" "npm --prefix ./pico-grid run start:server" "npm --prefix ./pico-grid run start:pico-grid"
scripts.start:tesla-logger: cross-env TESLA_PORT=$(port) concurrently "npm run start:teslahapp" "npm --prefix ./tesla-gateway-logger run start:server"
scripts.pack:happ: npm run build:profiles && npm run build:energy_monitor && hc app pack ./holochain/workdir
scripts.start:happ: RUST_LOG=warn hc s generate ./holochain/workdir/ioen-app.happ --run=$HC_PORT -a ioen-app network mdns
scripts.start:picogridhapp: RUST_LOG=warn hc s generate ./holochain/workdir/ioen-app.happ --run=$(port) -a ioen-app network mdns
scripts.start:teslahapp: RUST_LOG=warn hc s generate ./holochain/workdir/ioen-app.happ --run=$TESLA_PORT -a ioen-app network mdns
